objenome.op.math

Class LessThan

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.op.Node
      • objenome.op.math.LessThan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class LessThan
extends Node
    A node which performs the numerical less than comparison of two numeric inputs, called LT
    Since:
    2.0

      • LessThan

        public LessThan(Node child1,
                Node child2)
        Constructs a LessThanFunction with two numerical child nodes.
        Parameters:
        child1 - The first child which is being tested if it is less than the second child.
        child2 - The second child which the first child is being tested against.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public java.lang.Boolean evaluate()
        Evaluates this function. The child nodes are evaluated, the results of which must be numerically type (any of Double, Float, Long, Integer). If the result of the first child is smaller than the result of the second child, then a boolean value of true will be returned, otherwise a false value will be returned.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class Node
        Returns:
        true if the value returned from the first child is less than the value returned from the second child, otherwise false

      • getIdentifier

        public java.lang.String getIdentifier()
        Returns the identifier of this function which is LT
        Specified by:
        getIdentifier in class Node
        Returns:
        this node's identifier

      • dataType

        public java.lang.Class dataType(java.lang.Class... inputTypes)
        Returns this function node's return type for the given child input types. If there is two numeric input types then the return type will be Boolean. In all other cases this method will return null to indicate that the inputs are invalid.
        Overrides:
        dataType in class Node
        Parameters:
        inputTypes - the set of input data-types for which to get the return type.
        Returns:
        the Boolean class or null if the input type is invalid.
